text: Sphingomonas pruni is a bacterium from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from the roots of the tree Prunus persica in Japan .Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * * * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas pruni at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase pruni Category:Bacteria described in 1995
title: Sphingomonas pruni
